item.title: 耶伦为拜登辩护称其会议 "极为有效
item.description: 财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）在众议院听证会上回答有关总统精神敏锐度的问题时说，她的上司乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在他们都参加过的冗长会议中 "非常有效"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her boss Joe Biden has been “extremely effective” in lengthy meetings that they’ve both attended, in response to a question during a House hearing about the president’s mental acuity.】

item.title: RTX 即将达成向 Arcline 出售部门的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，RTX 公司正在就向私募股权公司 Arcline Investment Management 出售其柯林斯航空航天部门的一个单位进行深入谈判。【原文：RTX Corp. is in advanced talks to sell a unit of its Collins Aerospace division to private equity firm Arcline Investment Management, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普伊格将加入西班牙基准股票指数，梅里亚将退出市场
item.description: 奢华美容公司 Puig Brands SA 将被纳入西班牙基准股票指数，取代 Melia Hotels International SA，这是一年半以来该蓝筹股指数的首次调整。【原文：Luxury beauty company Puig Brands SA will be added to Spain’s benchmark stock index, replacing Melia Hotels International SA, in the first revamp of the blue-chip gauge in a year and a half.】

item.title: 加拿大民调显示，保守党领袖在经济问题上与特鲁多的差距拉大
item.description: 在 "谁是最佳经济管理者 "这一问题上，加拿大保守党领导人在选民中的领先优势进一步扩大，这凸显了贾斯汀-特鲁多总理面临的政治挑战。【原文：The leader of Canada’s Conservative Party has opened up a bigger lead among voters on the question of who would be the best economic manager, underscoring the political challenges faced by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.】

item.title: 鲍威尔呼吁提供通胀消退的证据，国债下跌
item.description: 由于美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向华盛顿立法者表示，他希望获得更多通胀降温的证据，从而增强了市场对今年降息的现有押注，美国国债因此下滑。【原文：US Treasuries slipped as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell told Washington lawmakers he wants more evidence of cooling inflation, bolstering the market’s existing bets on interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 耶伦附和鲍威尔称劳动力市场通胀程度降低
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，劳动力市场对美国经济通胀的推动作用已不再达到大流行病复苏初期的程度，这与美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）此前的言论不谋而合。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the labor market is no longer driving inflation in the US economy to the extent it was earlier in the pandemic recovery, echoing earlier comments by Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易台警告称 S&P 500 指数将受 CPI 影响而大幅波动
item.description: 根据摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Investors should brace themselves for a bout of stock market volatility this week after a lengthy period of calm, based on a warning from JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading desk.】

item.title: 林德纳对欧洲央行危机工具的质疑引发决策者不满
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）公开质疑欧洲央行可能向法国提供的危机援助的合法性，这考验着该地区决策圈的神经。【原文：German Finance Minister Christian Lindner’s publicly aired doubts about the legality of potential European Central Bank crisis aid for France are testing nerves in the region’s policymaking circles.】

item.title: 知情人士称图利普-西迪克将出任英国城市大臣
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）将任命图利普-西迪克（Tulip Siddiq）为英国城市大臣，她将在财政部担任这一职务，负责监管和倡导重要的金融服务业。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer will appoint Tulip Siddiq as the UK’s City Minister, a role within the Treasury that puts her at the heart of regulating and advocating for the key financial services industry.】

item.title: 法国下届政府将继承增长的韧性
item.description: 法国经济今年有望保持稳定增长，这将缓解下届政府在临时大选后面临的预算挑战，临时大选导致议会悬而未决，未来财政政策存在巨大不确定性。【原文：France’s economy is expected to maintain steady growth this year, easing the budgetary challenges facing the next government after a snap election that delivered a hung parliament and huge uncertainty about future fiscal policies.】

item.title: 派拉蒙可能在 Skydance 交易后被穆迪降至垃圾级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）可能将派拉蒙全球公司的信用评级下调至垃圾级，因为该公司同意将自身出售给 Skydance Media。【原文：Paramount Global may have its credit rating cut to junk by Moody’s Ratings after the company agreed to sell itself to Skydance Media, with the bond grader citing “significant secular pressures” on Paramount businesses.】

item.title: 南非旅游圣地遭受暴雨和大风袭击
item.description: 南非的旅游之都开普敦遭受了暴雨和狂风的袭击，基础设施遭到严重破坏，成千上万的棚户区居民被迫离开家园。【原文：Cape Town, South Africa’s tourist capital, has been battered by torrential rains and howling winds that have caused extensive damage to infrastructure and driven thousands of shantytown residents from their homes.】

item.title: 供应 "过剩 "导致比特币与科技相关性下降
item.description: 在最近几个月几乎同步交易之后，比特币与美国股市飙升的相关性在加密货币供应过多而需求不足的重压下正在崩溃。【原文：After trading almost in tandem in recent months, Bitcoin’s correlation with surging US equities is collapsing under the weight of too much supply and not enough demand for the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 美国财政部在 2023 年债券短缺后动用 20 年期债券大持有者
item.description: 去年年底，美国财政部要求 20 年期国债的大额持有者表明身份；当时，交易商根据回购协议借入国债的成本变得很高，而回购协议是国债稀缺的标志。【原文：The US Treasury Department asked large holders of a 20-year Treasury bond at the end of last year — when the issue became expensive for traders to borrow under repurchase agreements, a sign of scarcity — to identify themselves.】

item.title: 加拿大枫叶食品公司将分拆猪肉业务以促进增长
item.description: 加拿大最大的食品公司之一枫叶食品公司（Maple Leaf Foods）正在分拆其猪肉部门，以扩大增长机会，同时减少受商品市场波动的影响。【原文：Maple Leaf Foods, one of Canada’s largest food companies, is spinning off its pork division in a push to expand growth opportunities while reducing exposure to volatile commodity markets.】

item.title: 沙特以债务出售威胁警告七国集团不要扣押俄罗斯资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，沙特阿拉伯今年早些时候曾私下暗示，如果七国集团决定扣押俄罗斯被冻结的近 3,000 亿美元资产，它可能会出售所持有的一些欧洲债务。【原文：Saudi Arabia privately hinted earlier this year it might sell some European debt holdings if the Group of Seven decided to seize almost $300 billion of Russia’s frozen assets, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 壳牌计划在纳米比亚勘探结果下方的南非区块进行钻探
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）计划勘探与纳米比亚海上边界相隔的南非近海石油区块。【原文：Shell Plc plans to explore an offshore South African oil block located across the maritime border with Namibia, where a number of discoveries have been made.】

item.title: 科威特基金前英国负责人声称自己被不公平地排挤出局
item.description: 科威特 8000 亿美元主权财富基金的前伦敦负责人就其下台一事起诉了该公司，使一场持续不断的争端升级，让人们难得一见这个神秘基金的运作。【原文：The former London head of Kuwait’s $800 billion sovereign wealth fund sued the firm over his ouster, escalating an ongoing dispute that’s offered a rare glimpse into the workings of the secretive fund.】

item.title: 中国万科因销售停滞预计上半年亏损
item.description: 中国房地产市场喜忧参半，中国万科集团（China Vanke Co.【原文：China Vanke Co. said it is expected to post a net loss of about 7 billion yuan ($962 million) to 9 billion yuan ($1.2 billion) in the first half amid a mixed picture in the country’s housing market.】

item.title: 爱尔兰在大选前达成最终预算方案
item.description: 爱尔兰政府已在大选前就其最终预算方案达成一致，在增加公共开支的同时也违反了其自身的财政规则。【原文：Ireland’s government has agreed its final budget package before the elections, breaching its own fiscal rule as it increases public spending.】

item.title: 戴森将在英国裁员约 1000 人
item.description: 作为重大重组的一部分，戴森正计划裁减超过四分之一的英国职位。【原文：Dyson is planning to axe more than a quarter of its UK jobs as part of a major restructuring.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀飙升为墨西哥银行降息蒙上阴影
item.description: 墨西哥 6 月份的通胀加速度超过预期，使央行降低仍接近历史最高水平的利率的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated more than expected in June, complicating central bank’s efforts to cut interest rates that remain near an all-time high.】

item.title: 华盛顿特区的联合车站正在见证零售业的复兴。但一场法庭之战迫在眉睫
item.description:
随着星巴克和其他公司重返首都的交通枢纽，联合车站的商业业主正在与美国铁路公司对零售业的收购进行斗争。【原文：

With Starbucks and others returning to the capital’s transit hub, Union Station’s commercial landlord is fighting a retail takeover by Amtrak.

】

item.title: 美国银行转而看跌梅赛德斯，2024 年首次下调其评级
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）的评级今年首次被下调，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）预计，这家德国汽车制造商老化的车型阵容将拖累其销量。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG has been handed its first downgrade of the year, with Bank of America Corp. predicting the German carmaker’s ageing line-up of auto models to weigh on its sales.】

item.title: CLS 称，基金转变交易模式以适应 T+1 制度
item.description: 在美国于 5 月实行证券单日结算后，投资者提前为股票交易提供资金，并更多地依赖自动化进行交易，而货币市场也在适应新的制度。【原文：Investors are funding stock trades ahead of time and relying more on automation for their transactions after the US moved to one-day securities settlement in May, as the currency market adapts to a new regime.】

item.title: 埃尔多安警告北约不要卷入乌克兰战争
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）周二在领导人峰会前告诫北约盟国，不要采取可能将北约拖入乌克兰战争的措施，以对抗入侵的俄罗斯军队。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday cautioned NATO allies ahead of a leaders’ summit against taking steps that could drag the alliance into war in Ukraine against invading Russian forces.】

item.title: 天气威胁对北美石油造成影响
item.description:
在全球市场岌岌可危的情况下，任何长期中断都有可能导致价格上涨。【原文：

With the global market precariously balanced, any prolonged disruption risks driving prices higher.

】

item.title: 景气消退，特拉菲古拉面临巨额股票回购议案
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）在连续数年获得丰厚利润后，正努力应对巨额股票回购账单，这促使这家大宗商品贸易巨头削减支付给股东的利息。【原文：Trafigura Group is grappling with a hefty share buyback bill after several years of blockbuster profits, prompting the commodity trading giant to cut the interest it pays on money owed to its shareholders.】
